query:
Question: Margaret is running a full lap around a circular track. She is facing north when she starts. What direction will she be facing after she has completed half of a lap?

Choices:
A: north
B: south
C: east
D: west
steps: Margaret starts facing north at the starting point of the circular track.
As she runs a full lap around the circular track, she will complete 360 degrees of rotation, returning to the starting direction (north).
Completing half of a lap means she will run 180 degrees from her starting point.
Running 180 degrees from north will have her facing directly south.
